# orm2-doc-zh-cn

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/orm2-doc-zh-cn
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/orm2-doc-zh-cn
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install orm2-doc-zh-cn
orm2-doc-zh-cn <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g orm2-doc-zh-cn
orm2-doc-zh-cn <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
